Content: This is your first day in a new school.  It's both thrilling and kind of scary.
This is no ordinary college.  It's an all-girl academy renowned for its strictness.
You enter the austere building, it's outdated and cold, some windows have bars.
Every student is wearing the same skirt and tie, uniforms are mandatory.
It's 7:40 and class starts at 8:00, you take a seat behind a black haired girl.
